pages.title: Rubber
pages.text: The rubber is acquired from heating up rubber mix in a fireplace or forge. The rubber can be used as substitute for leather, in the production of conveyer belts.

pages.title: Rubber Mix
pages.text: The rubber mix is acquired from mixing vulcanizing agents with either crude oil or latex in a barrel, and letting it steep/mix for 8 in-game hours.

pages.title: Vulcanizing Agents
pages.text: Vulcanizing is used in the process of rubber making.$(br2)The vulcanizing agents are acquired from crafting kaolinite powder, sulfur powder, chalk powder and graphite powder together in a crafting grid.

pages.title: Chalk Powder
pages.text: Chalk powder that is used in the creation of vulcanizing agents. Grind a piece of chalk rock to get chalk powder.

pages.title: Latex
pages.text: Latex can be used for the production of rubber, which can be used as a substitute for leather in the creation of conveyer belts.$(br2)However, latex is currently not obtainable.
